name: Calc-Basic
info: A basic calculator application built with React using NextJS and Typescript.

name: To Do App
info: A to-do list application built with React, NextJS, and Typescript.

name: Brewery Search
info: BrewerySearchApp is a simple interface to search and filter a database of US breweries. Data provided by openbrewerydb.

name: Weather App
info: This simple weather app, built with NextJS & Typescript, allows users to search by city name and recieve a quick 3 day forecast. Data is pulled from the openweathermap API.
